overview: Mr. Addison (Randy) Crockett has over 25 years semiconductor equipment design experience. Prior to founding Trion Technology, Mr. Crockett served as R&D and Applications Manager for Tegal Corporation and was a Co-Founder of Matrix Integrated Systems serving as Vice President R&D and Engineering. Mr. Crockett has personally designed eleven systems for plasma-based processes including four systems for high volume front-end production.
